name: Charlotte Custard
text: Activate: Main Once Per Turn You may add the top card of life to your hand: Give up to one of your characters +1000 power until the end of your opponents next turn.

effect.text: You may add the top card of life to your hand: Give up to one of your characters +1000 power until the end of your opponents next turn.

powerMod.duration: until the end of your opponents next turn

meta.notes: Card has 'SAMPLE' watermark, but this is not a game error. The card ID, set, number, and stats are legible.
